name: Fanbots come from Venus [JimJam2018]
description:
My first game on Unreal Engine and my first Gamejam :D

Your a famous bot on Venus, all the fanbots noticed you. RUUUN!

This is a temple run styled game made in 48 hours for JimJam 2018!

Apologies for the crappy graphics and lack of sound, time was running out and everything decided to break in the last 24 hours. Gameplay > Looks and sounds

-== Controls ==--

A,D or Left,Right - Move

W or Up - Jump

S or Down - Duck

The white torus things are speed rings, they also give 50 points on pickup

--== GLHF ==--

- Insulin <3
